item.description:
A fun party with hilarious hens Egg Add.
A special festival held in Koko Village!
The hens prepare a warm shelter so that chicks can be born safely ahead of the Koko Village Festival.
However, there was a scramble for the shelter among hens.
If you don't remember the location of the eggs you've hidden and the ones your opponent has hidden, you may lose your nest. Set up the nest to protect the babies.

Playing the Game

 Pick the first person to start. When it's your turn, add the number written on the cards using as many cards as needed out of the 4 cards in your hand.(The sum should be 25 or less according to the number of lids)
 If you've added cards to make a number, find the lid of that number, put 1 egg, and close the lid again. Discard used cards next to the card deck.
 If you discard the cards you've used, take as many cards as you've used from the deck to keep 4 cards in your hand, and hand over your turn to the next player. (Always keep 4 cards in your hand)


End of the Game
If all players have used all of their eggs, the game ends.
[ Scoring ]
After the game ends, open the lid and each person counts the number of their eggs they see at the top. Each person calculates their score, and the player with the most points wins.
[ Extra points ]
If 3 or more eggs are in a row either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally, you get extra points for the number of eggs that is in a row.
Example) The number of eggs seen from above: 6 + the number of eggs in a row: 4 = Total points earned: 10 points

If there are eggs that are not placed in the nest by opening the lid of the nest that are full, each egg counts as -1 point.
Example) Earned points: 10 points + the number of eggs that are not placed inside the nest: 2 = Final score: 8 points
